name: MineGraph
description:
Minesweeper on a funky lookin' grid. Because who doesn't like Minesweeper?

Nobody. Exactly.

Now with 100% less getting screwed by RNG!*

MineGraph moves mines around on the fly such that if (and only if) things ever come down to guesswork, any of the possibilities will be made safe.

On the other hand, if you resort to guessing prematurely, the game will do everything it can to ensure you explode!

*barring any bugs
